channel.title: Looking for someone with extreme PhotoShop Skills
channel.description:
First off, mods, if this is the wrong section, just move it please :D.
Well basically, I need someone who is [b]really[/b], and I mean REALLY good at photoshop because I need a logo for my website. What I want is a realistic black, blue, and grey dragon(no cartoons please) breathing red/yellow/orange fire out of their mouth with a Z eched into it. Not like the actuall letter Z on it, I mean in the fire.
PM me if your interested. Oh, and I will pay for this to be done but obviously I can't discuss it here ;).

item.title: Looking for someone with extreme PhotoShop Skills
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:10, topic:98530”][quote author=fezz link=topic=141643.msg1366298#msg1366298 date=1179984117]
dragon in PS? …uhh… thats not possible >.< at least i dont think so lol

lol hodunken probably could do this request lol
[/quote]

Yes , But since he isn’t so experienced (He took like 1 month to make the head and shoulders of a devil)

This would take him like a year…[/quote]

Yes, but wasn’t Hodhunken found to have ripped that devil?

Maybe SomethingToHide? Hes the only other person I can think of who has ever shown any 3d work on these forums

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for someone with extreme PhotoShop Skills
